title: Elven Riches: The Quest of Lúthien's Legacy
tagline: Adventure awaits where magic and courage meet.
mpaa_rating_content: This movie contains nothing that would offend parents for viewing by children. The themes are ideal for family viewing and involve fantasy adventure without any violent or mature content.
critic_review: A heartwarming tale filled with whimsy and charm, 'Elven Riches: The Quest of Lúthien's Legacy' captivates with its enchanting world and lovable characters. Gary Oldmalt and Kevin Tart shine in their roles, bringing depth and humor to this family-friendly adventure. While it treads familiar ground, the film's commitment to pure, G-rated entertainment makes it a delightful watch for audiences of all ages. Director Stephen Ferret crafts a visually stunning landscape that is sure to spark the imagination of every viewer. A solid addition to the genre that reminds us of the power of friendship and bravery.
description: In a world woven with enchantment, two unlikely companions, the treasure hunter Lindir Starfinder (Gary Oldmalt) and the good-hearted exorcist Eärendil Lightbringer (Kevin Tart), embark on an epic journey to uncover the lost riches of the ancient Elven kingdom. With guidance from the wise but quirky sage Galion Whisperleaf (Geoffrey Almond), they must traverse perilous lands, decipher ancient riddles, and overcome their deepest fears. Together, they will discover that the true treasure lies not just in golden relics, but in the friendships they forge along the way.
prompt: Create a title, tagline, and Cynical description teaser of a MPAA G rated movie. The movie stars Gary Oldmalt and award winning Kevin Tart as the main characters. The movie also stars Geoffrey Almond as a supporting character. Directed by Stephen Ferret. A Fan Film History including a Treasure Hunter/Adventurer/Archeologist and a Exorcist participating in a Rags to Riches. make the character names of Elven origin. Provide what the movie contains which is the reason for the rating. The title, tagline and description should be consistent with the rating of the movie. Provide a critic score between 1 and 10 as critic_score. Provide a critic review as critic_review. Output result as json, title as the title property, tagline as the tagline property, rating as mpaa_rating, rating reason as rating_content, assign it a single word genre as genre, description as the description property.
